Name: Island Tribe 5
About the game: Play Island Tribe 5 and enjoy the fifth chapter in the amazing hit action series! The island heroes' researcher friend is being held hostage by the Atlanteans after he found a fantastic artefact. Your favourite heroes decide to go to the aid of their friend at the bottom of the sea to save him. Help them out in Island Tribe 5! - help your favourite island heroes save their friend the researcher from the Atlanteans; - explore a very detailed underwater world in challenging action levels; - strategically manage resources, repair farms and totems, and collect diamonds; - choose between multiple game modes like Easy, Normal, Hard, and Untimed.
Meta Title: Island Tribe 5: Jan 15, 2018, Realore and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Island Tribe 5? Check out the release date (Jan 15, 2018), developer insights from Realore, and a complete game summary.
